column4: Hi all.  I'm installing Ubuntu server on a new machine and have had a nightmate with LVM and partitions but installing is progressing - but it has go to LILO and it now says LILO install failed - what should I do ?
it installs lilo by default? I thought Grub was the flavour of the month?
that's what the install scripts are trying to install
ah... so the Grub install fails? any error messages?
oh.. and I don't know about the repos in feisty.. sorry
This is edgy server
but you can ask in #ubuntu+1 .That channel is dedicated to feisty suport
sorry bout that.. so.. it is trying to install Lilo.. what is the error message? just "install failed"?
hmm.. well.. try continuing.. perhaps you can redo this step later.. you're not using anything weird in the disk setup?
as in????

weird is for example.. using extremelt large or extremely small hard drives.. booting many operating systems from the same hard drive... using some ancient motherboard.... using a very very new motherboard
that doesn't sound weird to me... I haven't used lvm myself though..
in that case no, quite normal.  a Dell Optiplex gx280 with a single 250GB IDE disk at the moment
but continue the install.. I think you can install LILO or Grub later on
ok - here goes nothing!
I don't remember any problems with LILO/grub when I installed edgy... but I might just have been lucky
It's looking good.  Rebooted at the end of the  install - and LILO ran, and now my shiny new server is coming alive!
KurtKraut: apparently his install disc wants to install lilo.. I was asking myself the same question
apt-get will upgrade for you I think.. all console
why not run vlc or something else quick and dirty to set up?
sorry.. vnc
That's a good shout.  Up till now I've just had Webmin on there
I think there's a package that just shares your current desktop using vnc.. nothing to setup apart from perhaps a password.. xvncclient or something like that
cool
